Package com.gotakeahike.takeahike.services

Class TrailService

java.lang.Object
com.gotakeahike.takeahike.services.TrailService
@Service public class TrailService extends Object
Service class for managing trail-related operations such as fetching trail data from an external API and retrieving trails from the database.

Annotations: - @Service: Marks this class as a Spring service component, enabling dependency injection and service layer functionality.

  • Constructor Details

      @Autowired public TrailService(TrailRepository trailRepository)

  • Method Details

    • getDataFromApi

      public Map<String,TrailAPIDTO> getDataFromApi() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Fetches trail data from an external API. Parses the response JSON into a Map where the key is a String and the value is a TrailAPIDTO.
      Returns:
      Map<String, TrailAPIDTO> - A map of trail data from the API.
      Throws:
      IOException - - If an I/O error occurs while reading the API response.
      InterruptedException - - If the thread is interrupted while waiting for the API response.

    • findAllTrails

      public List<Trail> findAllTrails() throws TrailNotFoundException
      Retrieves all trails from the database. Throws an exception if no trails are found.
      Returns:
      List - A list of all trails from the database.
      Throws:
      TrailNotFoundException
